body.name: Vesgantti 58 inch Loveseat Sofa, Modern Couches with Button Tufted Seat Cushion, Velvet Sofa with 2 Bolster Pillows, Track Armrest, 2 Seater Couches for Living Room, Bedroom, Apartment, Green
features: 🐉 Timeless Appeal: Classic, chic and minimalist, Vesgantti love seat's velvet material, tufted back and wooden legs add to its sleek profile and provide just the right mix of comfort and mid-modern. It will be a lovely addition to your living room or home office.

🐉 Custom Comfort: The velvet couch for living room uses a high-density sponge to fill the seat and armrest, skin-friendly fabric, soft cushions and reinforced back, eases the rebound to provide ou and your family strong comfort.

🐉 Sturdy and Durable: You don't have to worry about its durability! Our 2 seater sofa with a sturdy wooden frame and high-quality springs can easily support the weight of 700 lbs. The solid wood legs with padding under the feet protect your floors from scuffs and scratches. So it will last a long time in your living space.
🐉 Tool Free Assembly: Sturdy tapered wooden legs made to fit easily. All parts and instructions are cleverly packed into one box for easy assembly in less than 10 minutes.

🐉 Multi-Scenes: Why not consider adding a stylish small couch for bedroom, living room, apartment, or loft? The small love seat sofa can be placed in a comfortable corner, providing the perfect solution for your small space. Whether plopping down after a long day at work, settling in with a steaming cup of coffee, or delving deep into conversation with friends, our loveseats are welcome presence in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, looks great and works in a small space
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small couch for my room that could double as an easy day bed without having to grab a futon and mess with that. Honestly, the couch is quite lightweight but still supportive. The base is firm, and the pillows it comes with are nice. It's not fancy by any means, but it suits my needs perfectly well and I love it very much.My one complaint is that the arms are a little loose and don't stay in their brackets, which could be a problem down the line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been so impressed with this couch! It went together super quick and easy and is sturdy and stable. We added some extra non slip pads to the feet on our wood floors and have been enjoying it. It looks good and is comfortable to sit on. I’m not sure how long it will last long term but I’ll be happy if it holds up for a couple years. Definitely would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This couch is really easy to assemble and took less than an hour to get everything unpacked and set up. It doesn't take up a lot of room and looks really beautiful. The seat cushions are comfortable but could use a little extra padding as it gets a little stiff after sitting on the couch for a while - we added a blanket on the cushions and that helps a lot. The only real complaint I would have is that one of the arms pops up a lot like it's going to come off and needs to be pushed back into the base. If you're careful it shouldn't be a problem but I'm not sure how it will hold up long term. Overall really happy with this purchase and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Couch for the Price. Exceeded expectations!
reviews.reviewText: Genuinely happy with the product I received and I rarely write reviews. So when I am impressed by a product, I take the time to write back about it.I was really surprised at how good the quality was for such a cheap couch. You usually can't touch a good quality couch for under $300-400 unless you get it used. This couch is soft and easy to assemble. There is a gap underneath so it's easy to clean underneath. It's comfy. I put together the couch alone. It comes in about 4 main pieces (back panel, 2 side panels, bottom half of couch), 2 cushions, 2 small side arm pillows, and 4 legs (with screws). Each of the main pieces slide into place via metal grooves and are well hidden once the actual couch is assembled fully.It's pretty light weight for a couch. Put some furniture sliders on it and it moves around with ease on hardwood floors. I lay down on it and while it's not enough room to fully lay as it is a loveseat, it does have enough room to lay with legs curled up. It feels pretty sturdy although I've only had for half a month. We'll see if it holds up over time. It feels like it sits about as high as most normal couches. The color is so pretty as well!I would definitely buy it again if I ever moved or needed another couch. I do wish there was a 3 seater version as it could probably fit 3 people if you crammed together and removed the small side pillows but as it's not made for that, it doesn't really affect the review of the actual product. I would definitely get a 3 seater of this if they made it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy but in a firm way, fall asleep on it all the time! Lots of Room for Small Size
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty sort of bright indigo blue color, lovely short soft velvet texture, quite easy to put together just screw in legs and slot the arms and back on. Its the perfect size, literally, fits 2 people quite comfortably with a little bit of space in between still, or a person and cat even more comfortably haha. Came nicely packaged but easy to unwrap and find all (not too many) parts. Really love the quality for money here its a super winner!Is firm-ish, but in a lovely way, because it still feels like soft memory foam, you just dont sink down to the depths, we fall asleep on it all the time, the armrest are the perfect height for support but dont get in the way and it has a very generously deep seat, especially if you remove the back cushions, but we havent even had to do that and we still have so much seating room.I know im gushing but for the price this couch could cost like 200$ more i feel, especially if you found it in a store, and it just looks classy. (picture is of it just unwrapped so there are some wrinkles in velvet, but it expands a bit and those go away and it settles)Literally no sacrifices here people, buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Vesgantti Loveseat Sofa in Green Velvet, and I am absolutely in love with it! The sofa is beautifully made, with a sleek and modern design that perfectly complements my living room décor. The velvet fabric is soft and luxurious, and the tufted back adds a touch of sophistication.The sofa is also very comfortable to sit on.The seat and cushions are filled with high-density sponge, which provides excellent support and pressure relief. I can easily spend hours sitting on this sofa without feeling any discomfort. Another great thing about this sofa is that it is very easy to assemble. All I had to do was screw on the legs, and it was ready to go in less than 10 minutes. Overall, I am extremely happy with the Sofa. It is a stylish, comfortable, and well-made piece of furniture that is perfect for any home. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a new loveseat. Here are some of the pros and cons of the Loveseat Sofa: Pros: Stylish and modern design Soft and luxurious velvet fabric Comfortable to sit on Easy to assemble Cons:The velvet fabric can be difficult to keep clean Overall, I believe that the pros of the Sofa outweigh the cons. It is a great value for the price, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish loveseat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wobbles and moves. Uncomfortable and wrinkled.
reviews.reviewText: I'm mixed on this purchase. This couch HAS to go up against a wall. Otherwise when I lean back the right armrest lifts up. Also the back only goes up a third of the way up my back. Who designs a couch like that? If it's not against a wall this couch would be unusable in my opinion. Even so the right armrest moves. Very firm, which I knew going in, so I can't complain much about that. The armrests and the back rest are the weak links .( Kind of important.) Also the back cushions are still wrinkled after three days. I don't think I'm being overly picky on these points. It is an attractive, cute couch as everyone seems to agree. I guess this is what $300 buys you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks classy and expensive, easy to put together and back cushions are so soft, at first I thought the seating area was going to be to hard but actually isn't and very comfortable. Comes in a box all flat packed, yes quite heavy but at least you know it is going to fit through doors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to put together, strong, and love the colour. It's comfortable, it's more of a two seater, then a three seater

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: What a bargain for the quality
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely surprised by this product. Ive had low expectations but it has amazing quality, very easy to assemble and just perfect for my small apartment! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for its price is an actual deal, comfy, easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, easy to clean, comfy and looks more expensive then it was.
